name: Getting Started
description: A well-rounded set of party prompts to get the fun going

prompts.text: %s, give out 3 sips to the most beautiful person in your point of view
Everyone take a sip if you are chewing gum
Everyone drink twice if you played Pokemon Go!
%s, drink twice if you've ever been to Europe. Otherwise give them out
%s, tell us the most romantic gesture you have ever made or drink 3 sips
If you are studying/studied business or finance, drink 3 times!
Everyone who majored in 'STEM', take 3 sips
If you are studying/studied 'English', take 2 sips and tell us a short story
%s, give the names of 3 of %s's exes or drink 2 times
If you can touch your nose with your tongue, give out 2 sips
If you can lick your elbow, give out 100 sips
People with an S in your first name, let's down it all!
Whoever is playing music, kill your drink
Whoever is playing music, give out 4 sips
%s if you can name 3 titles of songs that have been hits in Spain, hand out 3 sips. Otherwise, you have to drink them
%s, kiss %s's butt or drink 2 times
%s has to drink 4 times while %s is whispering in his or her ear
If your birthday is on an even numbered day, drink twice
'Songs by David Guetta', first person to repeat themselves or can't think of anything drinks 4 times. %s, you start
%s, make up your mind: who do you think has a better chance of getting into heaven, %s or %s? This holy person must drink 2 sips
Rock-paper-scissors challenge between the oldest and youngest player; the loser will drink 2 times
%s, drink once for each player in the room
Drink 5 times if you have ever faked a signature
%s, suggest 3 names. If one of them is the middle name of a player, you give out 2 sips. Drink them otherwise
%s, choose your drinking b*tch. You'll be able to transfer your sips to them twice this game
%s, choose something you don't like, all the players who like it have to drink 4 sips. You drink 4 sips if nobody drinks.
Decide who is the best looking person in the room. That person must now drink 2 times.
prompts.secondary: The King of Ugly has spoken. The good looking person must drink one more sip

prompts.text: %s, tells the first name and age of each player. The person whose name or age you screw up can give out 2 sips
%s, ask %s any question you want, and he/she must answer or finish their drink
%s, if you can give 3 song titles from the One Direction, give out 2 sips. Otherwise drink them
Cats or Dogs? Vote at the same time, losers must drink 2 sips
%s, drink 3 sips if you have planned a trip abroad this year
%s, imitate a snake for 5 seconds or drink 3 times!
Drink 4 times if you had relationship drama this week
%s, if you know all of %s's names (first, middle, last), this player will drink 3 times. Otherwise you'll drink 2 times
The person to the left of %s, drink 2 times
If you live here, take 2 sips
%s, kiss %s or drink 3 times
Decide who is the biggest goofball in the room. He/she will now be called Goofy and drink 2 times
prompts.secondary: Being goofy is awesome, drink one more time

prompts.text: Everyone decides who is the largest player, Hulk will get 4 sips
prompts.secondary: Hulk takes revenge and gives out 3 sips

prompts.text: %s must speak with a British accent until further notice!
prompts.secondary: %s, you can have your normal accent back

prompts.text: %s, you must say 'obviously' every time someone finishes a sentence. Drink 3 times if you forget
%s, give out 2 sips to someone who has already been to the bathroom since the start of the night.
Everyone with the letter 'o' in their first name, drink 4 times!
If you brought a mask to this event, take 2 sips
Would you rather live without coffee or without chocolate? Vote at the same time, losers must drink 2 sips
Down your drink if you're a redhead
%s do 30 jumping jacks or drink 3 sips
Anyone who is shorter than %s, drink 2 sips. If it's impossible, they drink twice
'Disney Movies', first person to repeat themselves or can't think of anything drinks 2 times. %s, you start
Anyone who is taller than %s, drink 2 sips. If it's impossible, they drink twice
%s, if your first time was after the age of 16, drink 3 times
Whoever has the biggest hands between %s and %s drinks 2 times
first person to touch %s's feet, gives out 2 sips
%s, make up your mind: who do you think is more likely to wet the bed tonight, %s or %s?
'Food that people cook on a barbeque', first person to repeat themselves or can't think of anything drinks 2 times. %s, you start
'Candy', first person to repeat themselves or can't think of anything drinks 2 times. %s, you start
%s, make up your mind: who do you think knows more about American History, %s or %s? This person must give out 3 sips
%s, you're under arrest! Keep your hands behind your head except for drinking!
prompts.secondary: %s, you can put your hands down

prompts.text: 'McDonald's Meals', first person to repeat themselves or can't think of anything drinks 2 times. %s, you start
'Synonyms for a woman's breasts', first person to repeat themselves or can't think of anything drinks 2 times. %s, you start
'Synonyms for a man's penis', first person to repeat themselves or can't think of anything drinks 2 times. %s, you start

Everyone hold 3 fingers up. Go around the room and each say something you have never done! If someone else has done it, they put down one finger and take a drink. Losers that run out of fingers take 2 extra sips!
%s, invent a new rule. Be creative
%s you're the penguin! You're not able to use your fingers
prompts.secondary: %s congratulations, you just learned how to use your fingers again

prompts.text: %s, you're now the Parrot. You must repeat everything %s says
prompts.secondary: %s, you can stop repeating everything %s says, it's really annoying

prompts.text: Anyone with cigarettes or a vape, drink 2 times
%s, if your age is an even number, drink 2 times, drink 3 times if it's an odd number!
%s, play the beginning of the last song you listened to on your phone. If the majority of players don't like it, drink 2 times
%s, make up your mind: which player is more of a Lord of the Rings fan?, %s or %s? Gollum must drink 3 sips
%s if you've drank more than 2 glasses tonight, give out 4 sips
Blondes drink 2 sips
People with brown eyes drink 2 sips
'Ways to cook an egg', first person to repeat themselves or can't think of anything drinks 2 times. %s, you start
%s, imitate a chicken for 5 seconds or drink 5 times
Drink 1 sip if you're single, 2 if you're in a relationship, 3 if it's a bit more complicated...
Drink twice if you've ever been cheated on.
%s, give 2 sips to %s or 4 sips to %s
%s, do a handstand or drink 4 times
Whoever's phone this is can give out 4 sips
Guys drink as many sips as there are hot girls in the room
Anyone with a phone on the table has to drink 3 times
%s, shotgun a new drink or down your glass
The last player to have peed, drink 5 times
If you're hearing someone read out this sentence, drink 2 times
%s give out 5 sips to the player you know the best
The person with the most instagram followers, drink 2 times
The oldest player gives out 5 sips to one player and 3 sips to another one
Everyone younger than %s drink 3 times. If impossible, then the baby drinks twice
Give out 3 sips to the player you know the least
%s, tell a joke or drink 4 times
Race for the heavyweight title! Down your drink if you weight more than 180 pounds
Around the room, recite the alphabet one letter at a time. If %s finishes their drink before the end of the alphabet, everyone has to down their drinks
Get your serious face on! Next person to smile drinks 5 times
%s, give two reasons why %s should go to heaven, if you can't drink 2 times
Would you rather never eat meat again or never drink alcohol again? Vote at the same time, losers must drink 3 sips
You must now use at least one curse word in every sentence
prompts.secondary: You can stop saying so many f*cking curse words

prompts.text: %s, you're antisocial! You can only speak to %s because he or she is your only friend
prompts.secondary: %s, you have been socialized! But you can still be friends with %s

prompts.text: %s, you're now the leader of the delinquents. When you shout out a curse word, everyone must shout it back. The last person to do so drinks 3 times
Cheers! Everyone drinks
